subject: Improve documentation system and add user guide
body:
- CLAUDE.md: Detailed guidance for each doc (what, when, why)
- README.md: Rewritten as user-facing guide with features and how-to
- docs/AI_MISTAKES.md: New file to track AI learnings and prevent repeat mistakes
- docs/HISTORY.md: Moved to docs/ folder

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
